content:
Monero (XMR) is your favorite, followed by Bitcoin (BTC) second and Stellar (XLM) third; USDT is not on your favorites list.

## TL;DR
- #1 Monero (XMR)
- #2 Bitcoin (BTC)
- #3 Stellar (XLM)
- USDT: removed from favorites

## Adjust anytime
If you want to change the order or add a #4, just tell me the new ranking and I’ll update it.
My favorite cryptos are XMR, BTC, and XLM

Saved — your favorites are Monero (XMR) #1, Bitcoin (BTC) #2, and Stellar (XLM) #3.

## TL;DR
- #1 Monero (XMR)
- #2 Bitcoin (BTC)
- #3 Stellar (XLM)

## Adjust anytime
- Want to add a #4 or change the order? Tell me the new ranking and I’ll update it.
Thank you, you ordered my favorite cryptocurrencies in order correctly, 1) XMR, 2) BTC, and 3) XLM.

Got it—I’ll keep your favorites recorded as 1) XMR, 2) BTC, 3) XLM going forward.

## TL;DR
1. Monero (XMR)
2. Bitcoin (BTC)
3. Stellar (XLM)

## How I’ll use this
- Prioritize XMR in examples, then BTC, then XLM.
- No USDT or other coins unless you ask.

## Adjust anytime
- Want to add a #4 or reorder later? Just tell me the new ranking.
